title: YO! WTF I JUST GOT ONLY 450 BE?
body: I thought there was a minimum up at 960 BE or something? i open my level 13 capsule. after not playing for ages i come back, level, 450 BE, no shards for anything just outright BE. this doesn't help my account or advancement at all because i just have enough BE to even purchase a 1350 champ. but seriously only 450?

replies.body:
The minimum BE is 820 post level 30. Pre level 30, because the experience to level is much lower, and it is where mostly new players sit, there are lower gains and they are more geared towards obtaining accessible (noob friendly) champs.

The wiki has a handy chart to tell you what you'll get for each level pre 30.
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Experience_(summoner)
